column5: OK I can't always paint fish--snakes and headstones  Here's one for the soccer moms  24 x 36  Called it---"Promise Me"
Very Nice
Thanks Joey
That is excellent!!!!!!
Thanks Davey Buoy
Its cute as a button Well done Bud !!! I Love the old tree.I find bare trees have so much more character than trees full of leaves.I often use them in my digital art to create atmosphere.
the painting is really nice work, the detail in paintings amazes me. however, that dude won't get anywhere kneeling there with handpicked flowers....
Thanks Mercman---yes they're a little more detailed but also more fun IMO  Thanks Smally21---Lets call it a life lesson for all the young fellers on this board
Always enjoy your painting Terrance. Very nice.
Thanks Bri
If that big old limb snaps and bonks her on the head, it's sure gonna spoil the mood  Always look forward to your paintings bushart, you've got a nice style !!
Thanks Lew---maybe he could give her mouth to mouth
Love all the work you post here!  Keep them coming!!
Thanks alot CCMT--like your music as well
Thats pretty amazing stuff. You must have worked for a long time to perfect that talent. I like the tree and the background. Keep up the great work !
Thanks MSP
Amen
I love your colors.  Sky is Magnificient.   :clapping:
Thanks Pikeslayer8
Awesome work Terrance as always
Thanks a bunch Jacques

You would probably like these two water colors and painting by a friend of ours Ruth Mudge...the water colors were a wedding gift and I purchased the painting as it reminded me of our old barn at Lake Scugog where I spent my boyhood summers...      I like your painting Bushart...well done...
Very Nice, Beans
